about.name: The following questions are from real DMV written tests. These are some of the actual permit questions you will face in California. Each permit practice test question has three answer choices. Select one answer for each question and select "grade this section." You can find this button at the bottom of the drivers license quiz.  For a complete list of questions and answers for California please visit https://cheat-sheets.dmv-written-test.com/en/california/car.

hasPart.name: If you drive faster than other vehicles on a road with one lane moving in each direction and continually pass the other cars, you will:

hasPart.text: You should avoid passing other vehicles on two-lane roads. Every time you pass a vehicle, your odds of being in a collision increase.

suggestedAnswer.text: Get you to your destination much more quickly and safely.

comment.text: Get you to your destination much more quickly and safely.

suggestedAnswer.text: Increase your chances of an collision.

comment.text: Increase your chances of an collision.
Help prevent traffic congestion.

acceptedAnswer.text: Increase your chances of an collision.

comment.text: Increase your chances of an collision.

about.name: You should signal continuously while turning because it:

hasPart.assesses: You should signal continuously while turning because it: | You should signal continuously while turning because it: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: You should always signal when turning, changing lanes, slowing down, or stopping so that other drivers, motorcyclists, bicyclists, and pedestrians will know your intentions.

suggestedAnswer.text: Is illegal to turn off your signal before completing a turn.

comment.text: Is illegal to turn off your signal before completing a turn.

suggestedAnswer.text: Lets other drivers know what your intentions are.

comment.text: Lets other drivers know what your intentions are.

suggestedAnswer.text: Is always unsafe to turn off a signal before completing a turn.

comment.text: Is always unsafe to turn off a signal before completing a turn.

acceptedAnswer.text: Lets other drivers know what your intentions are.

comment.text: Lets other drivers know what your intentions are.

answerExplanation.text: You should always signal when turning, changing lanes, slowing down, or stopping so that other drivers, motorcyclists, bicyclists, and pedestrians will know your intentions.

comment.text: You should signal continuously while turning because it: | You should always signal when turning, changing lanes, slowing down, or stopping so that other drivers, motorcyclists, bicyclists, and pedestrians will know your intentions.

hasPart.name: You should turn on your headlights:

about.name: You should turn on your headlights:

hasPart.assesses: You should turn on your headlights: | You should turn on your headlights: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Headlights must be used one half hour after sunset until one half hour before sunrise, when windshield wipers are being used due to rain or snow, and in any other situation when visibility is less than 1,000 feet. They should be used when a car is being driven on a small country or mountain road, even in sunny weather.

comment.text: One half hour after sunset.

suggestedAnswer.text: When stopped at a railroad crossing.

comment.text: When stopped at a railroad crossing.
When parked at a school.
One half hour after sunset.

answerExplanation.text: Headlights must be used one half hour after sunset until one half hour before sunrise, when windshield wipers are being used due to rain or snow, and in any other situation when visibility is less than 1,000 feet. They should be used when a car is being driven on a small country or mountain road, even in sunny weather.

comment.text: You should turn on your headlights: | Headlights must be used one half hour after sunset until one half hour before sunrise, when windshield wipers are being used due to rain or snow, and in any other situation when visibility is less than 1,000 feet. They should be used when a car is being driven on a small country or mountain road, even in sunny weather.

hasPart.text: When a steady yellow light appears on a traffic signal, you should prepare to stop. If you are already within the intersection, you should clear the intersection as quickly as possible.

suggestedAnswer.text: Speed up to beat the red light.

comment.text: Speed up to beat the red light.

suggestedAnswer.text: Reduce you speed and proceed carefully through the intersection.

comment.text: Reduce you speed and proceed carefully through the intersection.
Come to a safe stop.
Come to a safe stop.

hasPart.text: If you see a vehicle’s hazard lights ahead, slow down. There may be a collision or other road emergency ahead. Stop and give assistance if asked by anyone, or pass very carefully.

suggestedAnswer.text: Slow down and pass very carefully.
